I’m Harshith, welcome to my personal site!
I’m currently an aspiring ML/CV Engineer, passionately pursuing my Masters in Computer Science. My research interests encompass a diverse range of topics in the field of computer vision and deep learning.
With the privilege of interning at Intel, contributing to Google Summer of Code, and being part of the esteemed environment at the Indian Institute of Science, I bring a rich tapestry of experiences.
My journey has been punctuated by multiple acceptances at top conferences, showcasing my commitment to excellence. Feel free to explore my research publications here.
When I’m not forcing matrix operations down my GPU, I try to partake in a load of activites. Explore the fun page to see what I’m up to these days!



University of California, Riverside | USA
MSCS | Sept 2023 - Present

PES University | India
B.Tech CS | Aug 2019 - June 2023
